PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. You can set make sure it a single prefix `| . | .!*`

SESSION_ID.description: input bot session id here the one you received when you paired with Whatsapp

THUMB_IMAGE.description: This image will show when you used a v1/v3 menu you can get your image url from catbox

OWNER_NAME.description: put your bot owner nane here

TIME_ZONE.description: set your desired timezone continuent follow by your city mistake might cause error in console or crash the bot

MENU_TYPE.description: set your desired menu type v1 for thumbnail menu, v2 for no image and thumbnail v3 for only image menu

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + ",").

WARN.description: how many times you want the bot should warn user before kick

SYMBOL.description: This will show as the bot symbol before the menu

ONLYGC_MSG.description: set your desired message when the bot mode is set to only group

ONLYPC_MSG.description: set your desire message when the bot mode is set to only private chat
